metadata.title: Upper House resumes session to consider Non-Binding Budget suggestions

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 21 (APP): The Senate session reconvened Saturday at Parliament House, with Deputy Chairman Sardar Syedal Khan Nasar presiding, as the Upper House prepared to consider non-binding budget recommendations. The House resumed proceedings at 12:34 p.m. The Upper House concluded its budget debate following seven sittings. The deliberations centered on a motion moved by Minister for Finance and Revenue, Senator Muhammad Aurangzeb, on June 10, seeking the Senate's recommendations on the Finance Bill-comprising the Annual Budget Statement-under Article 73 of the Constitution.
